img_summary: The image depicts a small stone dish containing several brown, textured seeds. Based on the surrounding context, it is likely related to the "Black Myth: Wukong" video game and represents one of the collectible seeds, such as Gentian Seeds or Jade Lotus Seeds, which are categorized as uncommon items and obtained randomly through gathering specific plants in the game.
